blogs.author: Girish G Hegde
blogs.excerpt: Hey there! Welcome to Girish’s tiny little corner of the internet. From wild ideas about AI and the latest ML trends to quirky questions and random thoughts—this is a place where curiosity lives. If technology excites you or you’re just up for a chat, you’re right at home here. Don’t hesitate to message me anytime—I genuinely enjoy meeting fellow explorers.
